titleStmt.title: SII 7.544: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 544. (A.R. No. 318 of 1901). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmātu puṇarap puvimātu vaḷara nāmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpat taṉnirupatumalar maṉṉavar cūṭa maṉṉiya vurimaiyā laṇimuṭi cūṭic ceṅkol ceṉṟu ticaitoṟum vaḷarppa veṅkali nikki meyyaṟan taḻaippak kaliṅka miriyak kaṭa
malai naṭātti valaṅkoḷāḻi varaiyāḻi tiri Irucuṭaraḷavum Orukuṭai niḻaṟṟa vīrasiṁhāsanattu tribhuvanamuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟirun=taruḷiya śakravat=tikaḷ śrīvikramacoḻadevaṟkku yāṇṭu patinālāvatu jayaṁkoṇṭacoḻa
maṇṭalattuk kulottuṅkacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu puliyūrkkoṭṭattup peṟūrṉāṭṭuk kacavampākkattu Ūrom nilavilai yāvaṇak kaiyyeḻuttu Iṉṉāṭṭuc curattūrṉāṭṭup pallāpuratamāna vāna vaṉmahādeviccaturvvedimaṅkalattut tiruccura
muṭaiyamahādevar koyilil Ādicaṇṭeśvaraṟku viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Ittevar koyiliṟ paḷḷiyaṟainampirāṭṭiyāṟkut tiruppaṭimāṟṟukku Iṉṉāṭṭut tiruccurattuk kaṇṇappaṉ poṉtampi mukun=tanāna vikkiramacoḻamalaiyaraiyaṉ koṇṭu viṭṭa nilam
karuvampākkattu melkaḻaniyil muṉṟupaṭṭiyuṅ kuṇṭilum comācippaṭṭiyilum kiḻpāṟkellai villipākkiḻānum kūḷaṅkaḻuvalukku meṟku teṉpāṟkellai kaṇṭarātittaṉvāykkālukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai Ivvāykkālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai comāci
ppaṭṭiyil Aḷan=tu viṭṭa varampukkut teṟkum Iṉṉāṟpāṟkellaikku naṭuvu kuḻi 1000 .
Digital edition of SII 7.544 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
